index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's Community Development Block Grant Program for the Grant Program year commencing July 1, 1976 through June 30, 1977; accepting financial assistance from the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development; authorizing implementation of certain projects by the Executive Department - Law and Justice Planning and Office of Policy Planning, Department of Parks and Recreation, Department of Community Development, Public health Department, Department of Buildings, Department of Engineering and Department of Human Resources; providing for implementation of certain projects through agreements with the Seattle Housing Authority; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
